item.title: About
item.description: Greetings! This is Selvakumar and you have landed on my About page. As a DevOps Engineer based in India. I am deeply passionate about DevOps and Security, and I feel fortunate to have converted that passion into a successful career. I have gained 1 year and 6 months of experience in this field, where I have honed my skills and developed a profound understanding of DevOps tools and Cloud providers.

item.title: Posts
item.description: #2023 How to setup AWS ECS cluster as build slave for Jenkins Restore SSH connectivity to EC2 instance if SSH key pair is lost Migrate RDS Cross-Account Setting up GCP Filestore integration for Cloud Run
